TopicTitle: A video you must watch if you love fine music

Articles.Content:
I am part of a rather unusual organisation - the Virtual Choir.

Each year, we record ourselves singing a song written by composer Eric Whitacre, the founder and conductor of the choir, and we upload it to a video site, whereupon it is digitally combined with many others. The finished result is . . well . . how about I let it speak for itself.

I have been a part of Virtual Choirs 2 and 3, and assuming we\'ll be doing it again this year I\'ll participate in 4 as well.

I\'m not ONLY posting this here to say I\'m great ( )! I\'m recruiting. Anyone here a good singer, or even a satisfactory singer? As long as you are over 14 you will have the opportunity to participate.

We usually record in December/January. As the time comes around next year, I\'ll make sure you get a reminder. How about we break 5000 singers this time?

PS - If you want to find my video, it\'s in the column 28 from the left and 14 rows down from the top. As far as I\'m aware it doesn\'t get any close-ups (I\'m not pretty enough. ).
